mapper.select: SELECT FREE_BOARD_NO, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONTS, FREE_BOARD_WRT_DT, FREE_BOARD_FNL_MDF_DT, FREE_BOARD_WRTR_NO, ATCH_FILE_NO, FREE_BOARD_VIEW, ( select FRCS_OWNR_NM FROM FRCS_OWNER fo WHERE fo.FRCS_OWNR_NO = fd.FREE_BOARD_WRTR_NO ) as FRCS_OWNR_NM FROM FREE_BOARD fd ORDER BY free_board_no DESC

select A.FREE_BOARD_NO, A.FREE_BOARD_TITLE, A.FREE_BOARD_CONTS, A.FREE_BOARD_WRT_DT, A.FREE_BOARD_FNL_MDF_DT, A.FREE_BOARD_WRTR_NO, A.FREE_BOARD_VIEW, A.ATCH_FILE_NO, B.FILE_SN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, B.FILE_STRE_COURS, B.STRE_FILE_NM, B.FILE_THUM_YN, B.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, B.FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE FROM free_board A, ATCH_FILE B WHERE A.atch_file_no = B.atch_file_no(+) and A.FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET FREE_BOARD_VIEW = FREE_BOARD_VIEW+1 WHERE free_board_no = #{freeBoardNo}
UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET FREE_BOARD_TITLE = #{freeBoardTitle}, FREE_BOARD_CONTS = #{freeBoardConts}, FREE_BOARD_FNL_MDF_DT = SYSDATE, ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo} WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CMNTS_SN , FREE_BOARD_NO , CMNTS_WRTR , CMNTS_CONTS , CMNTS_WRT_DT , CMNTS_FNL_MOF_DT FROM COMMENTS WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo} ORDER BY CMNTS_SN DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET CMNTS_CONTS = #{cmntsConts}, CMNTS_FNL_MOF_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CMNTS_SN = #{cmntsSn}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
